title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1942/85 of 12 July 1985 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2742/82 on protective measures applicable to imports of dried grapes
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1942/85
of 12 July 1985
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2742/82 on protective measures applicable to imports of dried grapes
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The coefficient for the pound sterling referred to in Article 2 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 2742/82 is replaced by 0,941

This Regulation shall enter into force on 15 July 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 July 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 73, 21. 3. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 81, 23. 3. 1985, p. 10.
(3) OJ No 106, 30. 10. 1962, p. 2553/62.
(4) OJ No L 263, 19. 9. 1973, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 290, 14. 10. 1982, p. 28.
(6) OJ No L 136, 25. 5. 1985, p. 20.
